com.company.UserPackage

Interface Usable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Admin, Guest, User

    public interface Usable
    Created by Alexey on 22.02.2017. interface of all roles in catalog: ADMIN, GUEST, USER

      • getQouta

        java.lang.Long getQouta()
        getting quota of this user
        Returns:
        -1 - for ADMIN null - for GUEST USER.quota - for USER

      • isDeletable

        boolean isDeletable()
        Returns:
        true - if User can delete file from the list false - if User can't delete file from the list
